Package simulation

Class SimulationDeadline

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.SimulationDeadline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    utility.game.step.IDeadline
    public final class SimulationDeadline
extends Object
implements utility.game.step.IDeadline
    A IDeadline implementation with the possibility to reset the deadline. The lower and upper limit for the generated Deadline can be defined via cli-parameters.

    • Field Summary

      private ZonedDateTime deadline

      private int maxSeconds

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long getRemainingMilliseconds()  
      void resetDeadLine()
      Resets the deadline by a random number of seconds between lowerTimeLimit and upperTimeLimit.
      static void setLowerTimeLimit​(int lowerTimeLimit)
      Changes the global lowerTimeLimit for all instances of SimulationDeadline.
      static void setUpperTimeLimit​(int upperTimeLimit)
      Changes the global upperTimeLimit for all instances of SimulationDeadline.

    • Method Detail

      • resetDeadLine

        public void resetDeadLine()
        Resets the deadline by a random number of seconds between lowerTimeLimit and upperTimeLimit.

      • getRemainingMilliseconds

        public long getRemainingMilliseconds()

      • setLowerTimeLimit

        public static void setLowerTimeLimit​(int lowerTimeLimit)
        Changes the global lowerTimeLimit for all instances of SimulationDeadline.
        Parameters:
        lowerTimeLimit - the minimum number of seconds for a random generated deadline

      • setUpperTimeLimit

        public static void setUpperTimeLimit​(int upperTimeLimit)
        Changes the global upperTimeLimit for all instances of SimulationDeadline.
        Parameters:
        upperTimeLimit - the maximum number of seconds for a random generated deadline
